meanings.sent1: The farmer replows the field to plant new crops.
meanings.sent2: After the heavy rain, he replows the muddy land for better drainage.
meanings.sent3: The tractor replows the same path, making the soil dizzy.
meanings.sent4: His determination replows through any obstacles in his way.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the replows echoes across the vast farmland.

meanings.sent1: She replows the snow-covered driveway to clear a path for the car.
meanings.sent2: The farmer replows the field to ensure the seeds are properly buried.
meanings.sent3: The robot replows the same area, creating crop circles in the soil.
meanings.sent4: His passion replows through generations, preserving the family farm.
meanings.sent5: The sun replows through the clouds, illuminating the freshly plowed earth.
